mmorpg.stat_desc.accuracy: Increases your chance to hit, low accuracy also causes crits to fail. Specifically it decreases opponent's chance to dodge
mmorpg.stat_desc.aggro_radius: Higher radius means minions can travel further to kill stuff for you, lower means they will stay nearby more

mmorpg.stat_desc.archmage: This damage is multiplied by the damage effectiveness of the spell (The weapon damage %)
mmorpg.stat_desc.area_cast_time: Reduces cast time of spells with this tag
mmorpg.stat_desc.area_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.area_dmg: Affects dmg done by area of effect abilities. Think meteor or other large aoe spells
mmorpg.stat_desc.area_spell_dmg: Increases damage of spells with this tag. Totem Damage increases dmg of totems, etc.
mmorpg.stat_desc.armor: Decreases physical damage taken by a percent
mmorpg.stat_desc.arrow_cast_time: Reduces cast time of spells with this tag
mmorpg.stat_desc.arrow_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.arrow_spell_dmg: Increases damage of spells with this tag. Totem Damage increases dmg of totems, etc.
mmorpg.stat_desc.aura_effect: Increases stats your auras give you by %
mmorpg.stat_desc.axe_damage: Increases damage done if it was caused by that weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.beast_cast_time: Reduces cast time of spells with this tag
mmorpg.stat_desc.beast_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.beast_spell_dmg: Increases damage of spells with this tag. Totem Damage increases dmg of totems, etc.
mmorpg.stat_desc.bleed_chance: Chance to Cause the Ailment on hit. Maximum chance is 100%. Deals 120% of the damage as §6☀ Physical§7 Damage for 5s.
mmorpg.stat_desc.bleed_duration: Increases duration. For DOTs, this does increase the total damage dealt, but it doesn't increase damage per second.
mmorpg.stat_desc.bleed_proc_chance: Procs the accumulated damage of the ailment
mmorpg.stat_desc.bleed_resistance: Protects against the ailment, if it's 100%, it acts as immunity.
mmorpg.stat_desc.bleed_strength: Increases the effect, if it's a DOT, increases damage, if it's not, decreases the amount of damage needed to fully apply it.
mmorpg.stat_desc.block_chance: Chance to passively block hit damage
mmorpg.stat_desc.block_per_endurance_cha: Adds stats depending on how many effect stacks you have currently.
mmorpg.stat_desc.blood: Blood is a unique resource that works like mana.
mmorpg.stat_desc.blood_on_kill: Leeches resource every time you kill an enemy. This is capped as all other leech

mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_find: Adds chance for higher rarity of items found.

mmorpg.stat_desc.poison_chance: Chance to Cause the Ailment on hit. Maximum chance is 100%. Deals 150% of the damage as §5☀ Chaos§7 Damage for 10s.
mmorpg.stat_desc.poison_duration: Increases duration. For DOTs, this does increase the total damage dealt, but it doesn't increase damage per second.
mmorpg.stat_desc.poison_proc_chance: Procs the accumulated damage of the ailment
mmorpg.stat_desc.poison_resistance: Protects against the ailment, if it's 100%, it acts as immunity.
mmorpg.stat_desc.poison_strength: Increases the effect, if it's a DOT, increases damage, if it's not, decreases the amount of damage needed to fully apply it.
mmorpg.stat_desc.proc_blood_explosion: This has a short cooldown. You can see the whole spell stats in the Ingame Library
